org.socialhistoryservices.security
[Java] Class MongoOAuth2ProviderTokenServices

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.RandomValueOAuth2ProviderTokenServices
      org.socialhistoryservices.security.MongoOAuth2ProviderTokenServices

public final class MongoOAuth2ProviderTokenServices
extends org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.RandomValueOAuth2ProviderTokenServices

OAuth2 provider of tokens. Made for MongoDB As this is a port of the JDBC class, the Token and RefreshToken are divided into two collections. Therefore a todo: compose the two documents into one schema for one collection.
